channel.title: Making my character 'invincible'
channel.description:
I wanted to make my Owner account on my server to have the following: Infinite health (or at least so high I can't be killed) Infinite Special bar Infinite Run energy
Could someone confirm for me if this modding of my Character file would work to give me what I need? Thanks =] [code][ACCOUNT] character-username = Anakha character-password = -
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2936 character-posy = 3283 character-rights = 3 character-lastconnection = localhost character-special = 99999 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 99986 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 1 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 1645 1 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 1 character-look = 2 16 character-look = 3 20 character-look = 4 31 character-look = 5 33 character-look = 6 39 character-look = 7 42 character-look = 8 3 character-look = 9 1 character-look = 10 2 character-look = 11 3 character-look = 12 0 character-look = 13 2 character-look = 14 6 character-look = 15 7 character-look = 16 10 character-look = 17 5 character-look = 18 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 42117600 character-skill = 1 99 28000000 character-skill = 2 99 28000000 character-skill = 9999999 99 28001155 character-skill = 4 99 28000000 character-skill = 5 99 28000000 character-skill = 6 99 28000000 character-skill = 7 99 28000000 character-skill = 8 99 28000000 character-skill = 9 99 28000000 character-skill = 10 99 28000000 character-skill = 11 99 28000000 character-skill = 12 99 28000000 character-skill = 13 99 28000000 character-skill = 14 99 28000000 character-skill = 15 99 28000000 character-skill = 16 99 28000000 character-skill = 17 99 28000000 character-skill = 18 99 28000000 character-skill = 19 99 28000000 character-skill = 20 99 28000000 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] character-item = 0 1266 1
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF] [/code]
Cheers :D Spar.

item.title: Making my character 'invincible'
item.dc:creator: @Sparhawk Sparhawk
item.description:
@Sparhawk wrote:

Thought so, I was Belgarion on it, of course, now DH has been TOTALLY nerfed thanks to this stupid merging, so I’m more or less stopped playing it

And I tried googling, which is where i got the method from in the first place, but it’s awfully devoid of methods that actually work Oo[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 05:13:41 pm[/size][hr]lol I still go on the chat box and site, talk to the people I like, but most of them have disappeared too

Read full topic

item.title: Making my character 'invincible'
item.dc:creator: @Sparhawk Sparhawk
item.description:
@Sparhawk wrote:

kickingjamie:

“server” help. uTorrent is nothing to do with server. as of your other question it will probably work.

Ah, I’ll change to just ask the character mod question then, don’t suppose you could tell me the best place for hosting questions? Btw, didn’t you play DH at one point?

item.title: Making my character 'invincible'

@Sparhawk wrote:

I wanted to make my Owner account on my server to have the following:
Infinite health (or at least so high I can’t be killed)
Infinite Special bar

Could someone confirm for me if this modding of my Character file would work to give me what I need? Thanks =]
